briefTitle: Maintenance of Efficacy of Extended-Release Guanfacine HCl in Children and Adolescents With Attention-deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multicentre, Randomised Withdrawal, Long-term Maintenance of Efficacy and Safety Study of Extended-release Guanfacine Hydrochloride in Children and Adolescents Aged 6-17 With Attention Deficit/Hyperactivity Disorder
summary: The primary objective of this study is to evaluate the long-term maintenance of efficacy of Extended-Release Guanfacine HCl in children and adolescents (6-17 years) with attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) who respond to an initial open-label, short term treatment with SPD503.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Treatment Failures During the Double-Blind Randomized-Withdrawal Phase
